there was even bbq chicken on the menu
output.sentences: They were holding a hot pepper eating competition at Oktoberfest and only a man and woman were left.
The woman conceded by giving in a drinking the milk provided to cool her mouth.
Everyone celebrated the winner with a round of beers.
The man who won was crowned the winner and given a commemorative beer stein.
Next in the fair schedule was a rotisserie chicken dinner.
